explains: n. 便利设施；令人愉快之事物（amenity 的复数）
wordGroup: facilities and amenities 普通设施与便利设施

sentences.en: The campsite is close to all local amenities.
sentences.cn: 营地紧靠当地所有的便利设施。

sentences.en: Some houses still lack basic amenities such as bathrooms.
sentences.cn: 有些住宅仍没有像卫生间这样的基本设施。

sentences.en: The property is ideally located with all local amenities close at hand.
sentences.cn: 这处房地产的位置很理想，离当地的福利设施都近。
